title: What if the Patriots traded Tom Brady instead of Jimmy Garoppolo?
itunes:title: What if the Patriots traded Tom Brady instead of Jimmy Garoppolo?
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back to discuss a number of topics including what DJ learned at the Major League Baseball winter meetings this week and his interviews with former Rockies General Manager Dan O’Dowd (5:10) and current Cubs Executive Vice President/General Manager Jed Hoyer (9:30). The guys discuss the traits that translate from scouting across all sports and what is needed to build a winning culture (12:30). Then, DJ goes back in the ‘time machine’ to evaluate what would have happened if the Patriots traded Tom Brady instead of Jimmy Garoppolo in 2017(18:25)? DJ and Bucky also cover comments Troy Aikman made recently about being interested in a GM role down the line (26:10). The Senior Bowl roster will be revealed next week, and the guys revisit a conversation they had with QB Drew Lock from Mobile (32:00) and talk about the importance of the playing in the Senior Bowl. To close the show, DJ & Bucky answer a fan question from Apple Podcasts comments (36:10).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
